name: Raycast
description: Spotlight replacement with superpowers for developers
fullDescription: Raycast is a blazingly fast, totally extendable launcher. It lets you complete tasks, calculate, share common links, and much more. Built for developers who want to be more productive.

name: CleanShot X
description: The best screenshot tool for Mac, period
fullDescription: Capture your Mac's screen like a pro. CleanShot X gives you everything you need for superior screenshots and screen recordings. Scrolling capture, annotations, cloud storage, and more.

name: Pixelmator Pro
description: Professional image editing for everyone on Mac
fullDescription: Pixelmator Pro is an incredibly powerful, beautiful, and easy to use image editor designed exclusively for Mac. With an intuitive interface and ML-powered tools, it makes professional photo editing accessible.

name: iA Writer
description: The focused writing app with clean design
fullDescription: iA Writer removes distractions, giving you a calm, focused writing space so you can express yourself clearly. Features focus mode, markdown support, and seamless sync across devices.

name: TablePlus
fullDescription: TablePlus is a modern, native tool with an elegant UI that allows you to simultaneously manage multiple databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Redis, and more.

name: Dash
description: API documentation browser and code snippet manager
fullDescription: Dash gives your Mac instant offline access to 200+ API documentation sets. Search and browse docs while coding, store code snippets, and integrate with your favorite IDE.

name: Affinity Designer
description: Professional vector graphics editor without subscription
fullDescription: Affinity Designer is a professional vector graphics editor that rivals Adobe Illustrator. One-time purchase, no subscription. Perfect for UI design, branding, and illustration work.

name: Bartender
description: Take control of your menu bar on macOS
fullDescription: Bartender lets you organize your menu bar icons by hiding them, rearranging them, or showing them when you need them. Keep your menu bar clean and tidy.

name: Transmit
description: The gold standard of macOS file transfer apps
fullDescription: Transmit is an FTP client for Mac that supports FTP, SFTP, WebDAV, and cloud services. Lightning fast, beautiful interface, and rock-solid reliability for managing remote files.

name: ScreenFlow
description: Professional screen recording and video editing
fullDescription: ScreenFlow combines powerful screen recording with a full-featured video editor. Create tutorials, product demos, and presentations with ease. Export in any format.

name: Sublime Text
description: Sophisticated text editor for code and prose
fullDescription: Sublime Text is a fast, cross-platform text editor known for its speed, ease of use, and powerful features. Multiple cursors, command palette, and extensive plugin ecosystem.

name: Kaleidoscope
description: Powerful file comparison for text, images, and folders
fullDescription: Kaleidoscope is the world's most powerful diff tool. Compare text, images, and folders with pixel-perfect accuracy. Integrates with Git and other version control systems.

name: LibreOffice
description: Free and powerful open-source office suite
fullDescription: LibreOffice is a free and powerful office suite, and a successor to OpenOffice. Its clean interface and feature-rich tools help you unleash your creativity and enhance your productivity. Includes Writer, Calc, Impress, Draw, Base, and Math.

name: GIMP
description: Free open-source image editor rivaling Photoshop
fullDescription: GIMP is a cross-platform image editor available for GNU/Linux, macOS, Windows, and more. Whether you are a graphic designer, photographer, illustrator, or scientist, GIMP provides sophisticated tools to get your job done.

name: Avira Free Security
description: Free antivirus and VPN protection for your devices
fullDescription: Avira Free Security is an all-in-one security solution that includes antivirus, VPN, password manager, and performance optimization tools. Keep your devices safe from malware, ransomware, and online threats without paying a subscription.
